articles.title: Actor and comedian Gilbert Gottfried dead at 67, family confirms - CBC News
articles.description: American actor and comedian Gilbert Gottfried has died at the age of 67, his family confirmed on social media.
articles.content:
Gilbert Gottfried, the actor and legendary stand-up comic known for his raw, scorched voice and crude jokes, has died. He was 67.

articles.description: Kenedi Anderson abruptly left ABC's "American Idol" in Monday's taped episode, and Tuesday explained her move. She's not the first to leave midseason.
articles.content:
